thread.title: Audra Gilbert
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Audra Gilbert

author: Audra Gilbert
title: Audra Gilbert
text:
This is a situation in which I will be writing corporate
My sales person Karen was GREAT.. The advertising was misleading and deceptive at best. After talking to the store manager, I was thoroughly convinced by way of his percieved knowledge thinking im STUPID at best..
Doris Haines ( Audras daughter)
